full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,'PHAGS PA THAR PA CHEN PO PHYOGS SU RGYAS PA ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @082B BCOM LDAN 'DAS KYIS GSUNGS PA LA MNGON PAR BSTOD DO, ,'PHAGS PA THAR PA CHEN PO PHYOGS SU RGYAS PA 'GYOD TSANGS KYIS SDIG SBYANGS TE, SANGS RGYAS SU 'GRUB PAR RNAM PAR BKOD PA ZHES BYA BA THEG PA CHEN PO'I MDO RDZOGS SO, ,AOm SVA STI, THUB PA'I DBANG PO'I DPAL GYIS MGUR YANGS LAS, ,@083A *, ,DBYANGS SU BSGRAGS PA'I MDO SDE THAR PA CHE, ,MI BZAD LAS SGRIB RIMS NAD SEL BA'I SMAN, ,NGO MTSAR PHAN YON MDO RGYUD DGONGS 'GREL LAS, ,LAN CIG MIN PAR GSUNGS PA'I TSUL MTHONG STE, ,'JIGS RUNG NGAN 'GRO'I GA-YANG KHA 'GRIM PA YI, RIS MED NYAM THAG 'GRO LA SMAN PA'I SLAD, ,CHOS SBYIN MI BZAD SGO 'PHAR 'BYED PA PO, ,SHES BYA BCU PHRAG RIG PA'I GNAS RNAMS LA, ,PHRA ZHIB BLO GROS 'JUG PA CHES YANGS PA'I, ,AO THOG DGE SLONG GRAGS PA BZANG PO DANG, ,DPAL BZANG DAG GIS RGYU SPYAR DPAR DU BSKRUN, ,'DIR 'BAD DGE TSOGS DUS GSUM RNAM DKAR MTHUS, ,'BREL BA THOGS PA'I SBYIN BDAG CHE PHRA SOGS, ,LTOS BCAS KUN KYANG TSE RABS THAMS CAD DU, ,THEG MCHOG DAM PA'I MGON GYIS ZIN GYUR CIG , ,SRID 'BYOR RANG MTSANG RIGS PA'I SKYONG SHAS KYIS, ,BSLAB GSUM YON TAN RIN CHEN MDZOD 'DZIN CING, ,SRID ZHI'I MTSAN MA'I 'CHING BA RAB ZHI NAS, ,SHUGS DRUG RIN CHEN SEMS DANG MI 'BRAL SHOG , ,,TSOGS GNYIS MYUR DU YONGS SU RDZOGS PA'I LAS, ,PHUL BYUNG THABS SHES ZUNG 'JUG PHYIN DRUG GI, ,RGYAL SRAS SPYOD PA CHE LA RAB ZHUGS NAS, ,SKU BZHI'I GO 'PHANG MCHOG DE MYUR THOG SHOG , ,,CES GONG SMOS AOR TU SU AO THOG PHYOGS KYI DPYOD LDAN DGE SLONG GRAGS PA BZANG POS RGYU YON SBYAR TE, ,CHOS SDE CHEN PO SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING DU THAR MDO DPAR DU BSGRUBS PA'I DPAR BYANG DU GSER TOG HO THOG THU SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA YE SHES THUB BSTAN RGYA MTSOS SBYAR BA'O, ,MANGGA LAm, ,)
